data.actual_result: It doesn't. Still works if you get it right, but even a big-letter small-letter difference ruins it, and it's hard to find.

data.short_description: Tags and emojis helping box won't appear after tagging a person
data.steps_to_repro: - tag a person in a server - start typing : or #
